name: Loginworks Softwares Inc
tagline: Team you will Like, Trust and Admire
description:
Loginworks Softwares Inc incorporated in 2006 to build brands over the internet. Our core competencies lies in data services which includes data analytics, business intelligence, ETL, Big Data, Power BI, Google Data Studio, data warehousing, data visualization, and reporting.
- Data Visualization and Business Intelligence
- Data science/R-Programming/Predictive Analytics/Sentimental Analysis
- Data profiling
- Data modelling
- Packages and workflows to facilitate ETL
- Design and implementation of insightful dashboards using various tools
- Validating and disseminating reports/dashboards
- Workflow documentation
We also design & develop scalable and innovative IT solutions for enhancing business productivity. Some outstanding projects include Point-Of-Sales system, Office Collaboration software, Mobile Data Capture using RFID, Server Management application and, recently added - Mobile Ordering System.
Loginworks has served industries like Real Estate, Retail, e-Commerce with Big Data Solutions; Advertising & PR agencies, Hospitality, Finance to name a few. The company has worked extensively for Market Research and Real Estate clients in India and oversees.
Our customers chose us because of –
Transparency in operations
24X7 availability
Trustworthy teams
Highest confidentiality
Timely delivery
